messages.subject: SAMURAI WEBSITE DISCOVERED...
messages.msgSnippet: Dear All, This is such an interesting site that I m sure I m the last person on this list to find it, but just in case:
messages.messageBody:
Dear All,

This is such an interesting site that I'm sure I'm the last person on this list to find it, but just in case:

http://uk.geocities.com/rainforestwind/legends.htm

I've spent the last hour or so there on Oda Nobunaga alone...

Best regards,

Barry Thomas.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
